text: Iran participated in the 1st West Asian Games held in Tehran, Iran from November 19 to 28, 1997. Iran ranked 1st with 53 gold medals in this edition of the West Asian Games. ==Medal table== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=180|Sport !scope="col" style="background:gold; width:55px;"|Gold !scope="col" style="background:silver; width:55px;"|Silver !scope="col" style="background:#cc9966; width:55px;"|Bronze ! width=55|Total |- |align=left| Athletics || 11 || 13 || 14 || 38 |- |align=left| Badminton || 3 || 3 || 6 || 12 |- |align=left| Basketball || 1 || || || 1 |- |align=left| Boxing || 7 || 2 || 3 || 12 |- |align=left| Fencing || 2 || 4 || 4 || 10 |- |align=left| Football || 1 || || || 1 |- |align=left| Judo || 3 || 2 || 1 || 6 |- |align=left| Karate || 7 || 4 || 8 || 19 |- |align=left| Shooting || 1 || 2 || 4 || 7 |- |align=left| Swimming || || || 7 || 7 |- |align=left| Table tennis || 3 || 2 || 3 || 8 |- |align=left| Taekwondo || 6 || 1 || 1 || 8 |- |align=left| Tennis || 3 || || 2 || 5 |- |align=left| Weightlifting || 6 || || 1 || 7 |- |align=left| Wrestling || 9 || 4 || 2 || 15 |-class="sortbottom" !
